abstract: Q Investments is suing Carl C. Icahn’s Icahn Enterprises over a propose $2 billion debt offering, as part of an ongoing legal battle between the hedge fund and the billionaire investor.
snippet: Q Investments is suing Carl C. Icahn’s Icahn Enterprises over a propose $2 billion debt offering, as part of an ongoing legal battle between the hedge fund and the billionaire investor.
lead_paragraph: Q Investments is suing Carl C. Icahn’s Icahn Enterprises over a proposed $2 billion debt offering, as part of an ongoing legal battle between the hedge fund and the billionaire investor.

headline.main: Hedge Fund Sues Icahn Over Bond Offering
